phrases: Sota's been eating me out of house and home, so shopping's been rough.
J Yeah, brave and courageous Hurricane Star!
J Believe in yourself and your friends!
You are a good singer, Hori-san.
I cannot believe I was singing that in public...
What is wrong with liking anime music?
I am not into it, but Sota is.
He listens to those same CDs over and over, so now I know the lyrics.
Well, what kind of music do you like, Hori-san?
I have no idea what is popular!
But I know all the words to an anime song!
Wow, so you have been having lots of fun with him, then?
He comes over all the time to play with me!
You Wear More Than One Face
He comes over all the time to play with me!
You Wear More Than One Face
He even bought me a book, see?
He even bought me a book, see?
He reminds me of the dark villain in a detective movie...
What kind of description is that, Kyoko?
I would love to talk with him one-on-one sometime!
What do you want to discuss with him alone?!
Oh my God, he is been coming over to my house for forever now,
but I still have no idea what his first name is!
And our teacher took the attendance sheet with him...
Why do not I just ask him?
Hey, Miyamura, you got a first name?
That is the absolute last thing I should do!
Hey, Miyamura, what is P.E. going to be today?
Pretty sure we have a combined class.
Someone call him by his first name!
Are you pent up and frustrated or something, Hori?
If he were a little bit smarter, I would know!
I need to ask you about Miyamura-
Who knew trying to find out his name would be this exhausting...
Hey, Kyoko, is there something wrong with my curry?
This is the third day in a row we have had microwave curry.
So you have got no school tomorrow.
Oh, boy, I am so excited!
He is not coming over to hang with you, Mom.
Wait, he might tell Mom his name!
I am so glad to finally meet you!
So this is what she is like.
I am sorry, Kyoko's out on some errands right now.
She is told me so much about you.
I would love to sit and chat, but I have to get back to work.
I will be heading out soon, too...
Thank you for always helping out.
Uh, she went back to work.
She sent me on errands so she could talk alone with him!
Your mom's the first person to call me by my first name since 6th grade.
I heard you the first time!
Oh, you mean how she used it?
Has this guy literally ever had a coherent conversation with me?
Ugh, that is not what I meant!
You know, Hori-san, you have been acting kind of weird lately.
I mean, you were watching the guys change at school.
Yeah, but I had a reason.
Wait, do you have a crush on someone or something?
That is what you have been so worried about?!
Wow, sis, you are so lame!
How am I supposed to ask you that, huh?!
-You are such a lame-o! -I am borrowing your pen.
-You are such a lame-o! -I am a lame-o?!
-Ow, that hurts, you lame-o! -I am a lame-o?!
-Ow, that hurts, you lame-o! -I am a lame-o?!
Oh, sorry, let me write down the pronunciation.
Whatever, I am keeping this, just in case I forget it again.
I would really rather you did not forget it.
You will remember it easier if you say it!
I will just keep calling you Miyamura!
Do you not know my first name?!
I look like a total moron!
Sometimes, Hori-san says the dumbest things.
But you will get mad at me if I laugh.
I know you are already so busy.
I would do anything for you, Sengoku-kun.
Hold onto these for a sec, Sakura.
Things go much smoother when you have got capable people on the job.
could I ask another favor of you?
The student council is really swamped right now...
I know how it is, Sengoku-kun.
These what the Student Council wanted you to handle?
Why do you have to do their work, Hori-san?!
Most of their members are new right now, so they are having a hard time.
It is still weird that they are having you do this important stuff.
They are just using you, Hori!
Sure, but they need the help, so I do not mind.
And we are too dumb to help out with anything.
President Sengoku's top of the class, right?
The girls all like him, too.
Maybe Hori-san's helping him out because she likes him.
Here are the files and notebooks I worked on.
They are hot and dating each other?!
Though I do not think she does much work.
So they are just pushing the hot girl's work onto you, Hori!
Jeez, do not put it like that.
the work I just did was Ayasaki-san's responsibility.
They are totally making her do her work...
I am going to head home.
I wonder if she would feel better if I baked her a cake.
-I do not have time for this!
-I do not have time for this!
Ugh, Sakura's going to yell at me again for being late!
Uh, I probably do not need it, so just throw it out!
I could not even get a word in, and now she is gone...
I told you, I gave you everything I worked on!
I know, but there are papers missing.
The student council's yelling at Hori-san!
I gave you everything yesterday, including the budget paperwork!
Remi says she did not see.
You did not check to see if it was everything, did you?
Sure, but should not you guys-
You are right, some of the blame falls on us.
But only if those budget papers were in the pile you handed over.
But to be honest, I was so tired, I cannot remember...
I hear the council's running behind because she lost those papers.
If it is your fault, I just want an apology.
Hori finished working on the budget!
She gave it to you yesterday!
Man, all she has to do is apologize.
Can you hold my bag and glasses?
You do not have to tell them anything, Hori-san.
What the hell are you doing?!
Why did you think you could-?
Is this what you were looking for?
I found it in the hall yesterday.
Ayasaki-san told me to throw it away.
I did not tell you to-
Ohhh, you mean in the hall...
So it was not Hori-san's fault?
I am just glad it got resolved.
I was this close to crying.
No way it could have been you.
You really helped me out there, Miyamura.
I just happened to be there is all.
But why did you need to headbutt him if you had the papers?
Oh, I was just kind of pissed at him.
Does the Student Council Prez have some dirt on you or something?
I mean, you always do whatever he asks you to do.
C'mon, it is just'because the student council's so busy!
And Sengoku... -kun and I have known each other for forever!
Sengoku, you are such a crybaby!
When high school starts, I am not going to be your dog anymore!
Wow, that is how you saw yourself?
And you are going to use an honorific with my name!
I want to have a normal, happy time in high school!
You will do it, or I will tell everyone how you treated me!
This is what I am talking about!
Seriously, I have known him forever!
He definitely has dirt on her.
Sengoku was traumatized by what happened.
Hey, it is almost Hori's birthday.
It is at the end of March.
Oh, so it is during spring break.
I was thinking of getting her something.
But she is turned me down once already.
I would just be bothering her.
I do not think it would bother her.
There is nothing wrong with wanting to get her something.
I guess, but I have got no idea what to get her.
It is the thought that counts.
Just get her whatever you want.
No way, that is way too serious.
Do not you know what kind of stuff she likes, Miyamura?
Hey, do you think my bro will come here every day over break?
And remember, this will not last forever.
When will Miyamura stop coming over?
You would be sad if he stopped coming over, right?
C'mon, sis, be a little more honest with yourself.
Spring break made me totally forget about it.
A CD of all the songs people our age are into?
The ones I like, at least.
How did he know that this was what I wanted?
If it is my birthday, that means spring break's almost over.
We will be third years soon, huh?
That is Why It is Okay
